name: Extreme Home Designer
description:
Oh my, what grand interior are you going to design on this fabulous occasion? Time to bombard this small apartment room with majestic furniture and achieve the highest of marks!

Controls:

  • WASD/Left control stick - Rotate the camera
  • Cursor/Right control stick - Aim
  • Click/Right trigger/A button - Fire!
  • Q key/E key/Mouse wheel/Shoulder buttons - Cycle through furniture

Blue-ish sphere thingies mean there's bonus points to get for certain furniture combinations! Don't be afraid to throw the TV-cabinet after the TV, this is new, modern, fantastic design after all.

Originally, the game is meant to be played on  Windows machine, so not all functionality works in the web version, sorry!

This game was created during the Global Game Jam of 2019: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/extreme-home-designer 

Voted best Global Game Jam game Enschede 2019 together with another team. 

Credits:

  • Tess Vermeeren - Art
  • Niels Meijer - Programming
  • Bas Hoogeboom - Programming
